name: Paper 2D Platformer
description:
A simple 2D platformer prototype built with Unreal Engine 4 using the Paper2D plugin.

The player must maneuver through the level and find their way to the top, all the while collecting coins.

CONTROLS:
Move Left/Right - 'A' & 'D' or 'Arrow Keys'
Run/Sprint - 'Left Shift'
Jump - 'Space'

[Prototype Level]
